name: Ostrich Pillow
shortDescription: Create your own snugly space in the world and feel-good anywhere with the ultimate cocoon pillow.
longDescription: With a durable covering that encompasses the entire head and neck, the Ostrich Pillow makes it possible to nap anywhere! Catch a quick nap against a bus window, the metal rails of a subway seat, the bark of a tree, on the desk at work, or even the back of a park bench.
